import React from 'react'; import { FaCreditCard, FaTruck, FaShieldAlt, FaCreditCard as FaCard, FaBarcode, FaPix, FaCheckCircle } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { lenovoData } from '../data/lenovoData'; import '../styles/PaymentInfo.css'; const PaymentInfo = () => { const { payment, shipping, warranty } = lenovoData; return (

Informações de Compra

{/* Métodos de Pagamento */}

Métodos de Pagamento

{payment.methods.map((method, index) => (
{method}
))}

Parcelamento

{payment.installments.interest}

Em até {payment.installments.max}x

Segurança

{payment.security.map((security, index) => ( {security} ))}
{/* Informações de Entrega */}

Entrega

Frete Grátis

{shipping.freeShipping}

Prazo de Entrega

{shipping.deliveryTime}

Rastreamento

{shipping.tracking}

Retirada

{shipping.pickup}

{/* Garantia */}

Garantia

{warranty.standard}

Garantia Estendida

{warranty.extended}

Garantia Internacional

{warranty.international}

Cobertura

    {warranty.coverage.map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
); }; export default PaymentInfo;
